message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.SD 

Reasoning: The paper proposes a framework to systematically characterize the relations between ideas based on their occurrence in a corpus of documents, which is a common theme in natural language processing and information retrieval (cs.CL, cs.IR). The approach combines two statistics to reveal different ways in which ideas can cooperate and compete, which is related to machine learning and data mining (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the distributions of pairwise cooccurrence and prevalence correlation, which is related to statistical analysis (cs.SI). Finally, the paper demonstrates the approach through case studies on news articles and research papers, which is related to data science (cs.SD).
